trans-unit.source: An installable version of the original Pelican Series plugin
trans-unit.target: 原版Pelican系列插件的可安装版本。

trans-unit.source: By default articles in a series are ordered by date and then automatically numbered.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,系列中的文章按日期排序,然后自动编号。

trans-unit.source: Contributions are welcome and much appreciated. Every little bit helps. You can contribute by improving the documentation, adding missing features, and fixing bugs. You can also help out by reviewing and commenting on existing issues.
trans-unit.target: Contributions are welcome and much appreciated. Every little bit helps. You can contribute by improving the documentation, adding missing features, and fixing bugs. You can also help out by reviewing and commenting on existing issues.

trans-unit.source: If you want to force a given order just specify the :series_index: metadata or in Markdown series_index:, starting from 1. All articles with this enforced index are put at the beginning of the series and ordered according to the index itself. All the remaining articles come after them, ordered by date.
trans-unit.target: If you want to force a given order just specify the :series_index: metadata or in Markdown series_index: , starting from 1. All articles with this enforced index are put at the beginning of the series and ordered according to the index itself. All the remaining articles come after them, ordered by date.

trans-unit.source: In order to mark posts as part of a series, use the :series: metadata:
trans-unit.target: In order to mark posts as part of a series, use the :series: metadata:

trans-unit.source: Joins articles in a series and provides variables to manage the series in the template.
trans-unit.target: 将文章加入到一个系列中,并提供变量来管理模板中的系列。

trans-unit.source: Next add it to the PLUGINS section in pelicanconf.py
trans-unit.target: Next add it to the PLUGINS section in pelicanconf.py

trans-unit.source: Pelican Series: A Plugin for Pelican
trans-unit.target: 鹈鹕系列。鹈鹕系列的一个插件

trans-unit.source: The plugin collects all articles belonging to the same series and provides series-related variables that you can use in your template.
trans-unit.target: 该插件收集了所有属于同一系列的文章,并提供了系列相关的变量,你可以在你的模板中使用。

trans-unit.source: The plugin provides the following variables to your templates
trans-unit.target: 该插件为您的模板提供了以下变量。

trans-unit.source: The series plugin allows you to join different posts into a series.
trans-unit.target: 系列插件可以让你将不同的文章加入到一个系列中。

trans-unit.source: This plugin can be installed via:
trans-unit.target: 这个插件可以通过安装。

trans-unit.source: This plugin extends the original series plugin by FELD Boris lothiraldan@gmail.com Copyright (c) Leonardo Giordani giordani.leonardo@gmail.com This plugin is also in the Pelican Plugins repository
trans-unit.target: This plugin extends the original series plugin by FELD Boris lothiraldan@gmail.com Copyright (c) Leonardo Giordani giordani.leonardo@gmail.com This plugin is also in the Pelican Plugins repository

trans-unit.source: To start contributing to this plugin, review the Contributing to Pelican documentation, beginning with the Contributing Code section.
trans-unit.target: To start contributing to this plugin, review the Contributing to Pelican documentation, beginning with the Contributing Code section.
